application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to discharge of Condition 8 (Lighting) in relation to areas outside of the envelope of the building (including Neighbourhood Square and surrounding streetscapes in the red line) within the  Plot 14 Reserved Matters Approval (LPA ref: 20/5690/RMA amended by 23/1877/NMA, 23/5029/NMA, 23/5439/NMA, 24/4355/NMA, and 24/4487/NMA ) falling within Phase 2 (South) (Plots) of Planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the Comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood.
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area,North West London
